# Tests the config command prints the correct configs

dotm config get profile1 --path
stdout mypath

dotm config get profile1 --remote
stdout myremote

dotm config get profile1 --hooks-enabled
stdout false

dotm config get profile1 --includes
stdout a
stdout b

dotm config get profile1 --excludes
stdout c
stdout d

dotm config get profile1 --pre-updates
stdout e
stdout f

dotm config get profile1 --post-updates
stdout g
stdout h

-- home/testuser/.config/dotm/config.toml --
[profiles]
  [profiles.profile1]
    path = "mypath"
    remote = "myremote"
    hooks_enabled = false
    includes = [
        "a",
        "b"
    ]
    excludes = [
        "c",
        "d"
    ]
    pre_update = [
        "e",
        "f"
    ]
    post_update = [
        "g",
        "h"
    ]
